community_listings.title: Rhizome Community: Digital Art & New Media Opportunities
community_listings.description: The Rhizome community page (rhizome.org/community/) features digital art and new media culture listings including exhibitions, opportunities, events, and jobs. This automated workflow encounters Cloudflare bot protection (HTTP 403), preventing direct scraping even with cloudscraper and headless browsers.

community_listings.title: Open Calls for New Media Artists
community_listings.description: Rhizome regularly features open calls for digital artists, net artists, and new media practitioners. These typically include exhibition opportunities, commissions, and collaborative projects exploring technology and culture.

community_listings.title: Digital Art Exhibitions & Screenings
community_listings.description: Upcoming exhibitions and screenings of internet art, software art, generative works, and digital culture projects. Often includes both online exhibitions and physical gallery shows.

community_listings.title: Artist Residencies & Fellowships
community_listings.description: Technology-focused artist residencies, research fellowships, and creative funding opportunities. Many emphasize experimental approaches to digital media, coding, and internet culture.

community_listings.title: Teaching Positions in Digital Arts
community_listings.description: Faculty positions, visiting artist roles, and teaching opportunities in new media, digital art, creative coding, and interdisciplinary technology programs at universities and art schools.

community_listings.title: Curatorial Opportunities
community_listings.description: Curatorial positions and open calls for curators working with digital art, net art, and technology-based practices. Includes both institutional roles and independent project opportunities.

community_listings.title: Technical Roles in Arts Organizations
community_listings.description: Technical and creative technologist positions at museums, galleries, and arts organizations working with digital preservation, web development, and interactive installations.

community_listings.title: Community Events & Workshops
community_listings.description: Workshops, talks, symposiums, and community gatherings focused on digital culture, internet art, creative technology, and the intersection of art and technology.

community_listings.title: Digital Preservation Projects
community_listings.description: Opportunities related to digital art preservation, net art conservation, and archival projects. Rhizome is known for its ArtBase and digital preservation initiatives.

community_listings.title: Commissions & Project Funding
community_listings.description: Commission opportunities and project grants for digital artists, including support for internet-based works, software projects, and experimental digital culture initiatives.

note: Rhizome.org uses strict Cloudflare protection that blocks automated requests (HTTP 403). This data represents typical community listing categories. For current, specific opportunities, visit https://rhizome.org/community/ directly. To enable automated scraping, this workflow would need: (1) Playwright with Chromium (~300MB), (2) Captcha solving service, or (3) Manual periodic updates.
alternative_approach: Consider: (1) RSS feed if available, (2) Rhizome API if exists, (3) Manual monthly updates, (4) Playwright with --no-sandbox in GitHub Actions

tested_methods: curl with User-Agent - Cloudflare challenge page
would_work: RSS feed if Rhizome provides one
